title: Anuar Guerrero
text: Anuar Francisco Guerrero Olmos (born 3 April 1979, in <a href="Santa%20Marta">Santa Marta</a>, Colombia), known as Anuar Guerrero, is a Colombian <a href="association%20football">football</a> forward, who currently plays for <a href="Am%C3%A9rica%20de%20Cali">América de Cali</a> in the <a href="Copa%20Mustang">Copa Mustang</a>.
